short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This switches out the names for two spectacular investments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The kids of the late 80s and early 90s have been through the Bitcoin-like hysteria before. We know how it ends. To keep our expectations grounded, this extension replaces the adorable cryptocurrency with the adorable plush dolls we hoarded like crazy people, protected vigorously like private keys, and expected to pay for college with.
